MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD8 and TD9 postcode areas of Jedburgh and Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.19AM. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to site to investigate reports of a grounded overhead line. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10.30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.33AM on 30 January 2021.
